word_mean: 电离层：大气中由于阳光辐射作用于大气成分而有离子生成的区间
有大量离子和自由电子，足以反射电磁波的部分大气层。距地面高度70—500km。

sentence.Network_en: The ionosphere is that region of space contatining electrically charged species.
sentence.Network_cn: 电离层是指含有带电物质的空间区域.

sentence.Network_en: Its upper limit is determined by the conditions in the ionosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 其上限由电离层的状态而决定.

sentence.Network_en: Rockets and artificial satellites can go far above the ionosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 火箭和人造卫星能够到达电离层以上极远的地方.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 电离层(Ionosphere)是地球大气的一个电离区域。60千米以上的整个地球大气层都处于部分电离或完全电离的状态,电离层是部分电离的大气区域,完全电离的大气区域称磁层.
invasion 侵入ionosphere 电离圈isobar 等压线

list.abs: ...ionospheric refraction correction 电离层折射校正ionospheric refraction 电离层折射ionospheric scatter propagation 电离层散射传播.
ionospheric storm 电离层暴ionospheric wave 电离层波ionospheric wave 电离层反射波
ionospheric disturbance 电离层扰动ionospheric storm 电离层暴iras object iras 天体
[编辑本段]电离层扰动电离层扰动(ionospheric disturbance)电离层结构偏离其常规形态的急剧变化,又称电离层骚扰。电离源的突变、非平衡态动力学过程、不稳定的磁流.

means.word_mean: 1. the outer region of the Earth's atmosphere; contains a high concentration of free electrons

auth_sentence.content: Fluctuations in solar radiation cause the ionosphere to expand and contract.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fluctuations in solar radiation cause the ionosphere to expand and contract.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fluctuations in solar radiation cause the ionosphere to expand and contract.

auth_sentence.content: But the cause of the changes in the ionosphere was not established.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the cause of the changes in the ionosphere was not established.

auth_sentence.content: Mantle is responsible for sustaining our air, water and our atmosphere and ionosphere.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mantle is responsible for sustaining our air, water and our atmosphere and ionosphere.
